Service.Name: HelpRegion

Action.Name: InvokeWorkflow
Action.XamlDefinition:
<Activity mc:Ignorable="sap" x:Class="HelpRegion" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/netfx/2009/xaml/activities" xmlns:av="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation" xmlns:mc="http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/markup-compatibility/2006" xmlns:mva="clr-namespace:Microsoft.VisualBasic.Activities;assembly=System.Activities" xmlns:s="clr-namespace:System;assembly=mscorlib" xmlns:sap="http://schemas.microsoft.com/netfx/2009/xaml/activities/presentation" xmlns:scg="clr-namespace:System.Collections.Generic;assembly=mscorlib" xmlns:uaba="clr-namespace:Unlimited.Applications.BusinessDesignStudio.Activities;assembly=Dev2.Activities" xmlns:uf="clr-namespace:Unlimited.Framework;assembly=Dev2.Core" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"> <x:Members> <x:Property Name="AmbientDataList" Type="InOutArgument(scg:List(x:String))" /> <x:Property Name="ParentWorkflowInstanceId" Type="InOutArgument(s:Guid)" /> <x:Property Name="ParentServiceName" Type="InOutArgument(x:String)" /> </x:Members> <sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize>1094,1398</sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize> <mva:VisualBasic.Settings>Assembly references and imported namespaces serialized as XML namespaces</mva:VisualBasic.Settings> <Flowchart sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="1054,1358" mva:VisualBasic.Settings="Assembly references and imported namespaces serialized as XML namespaces"> <Flowchart.Variables> <Variable x:TypeArguments="scg:List(x:String)" Name="InstructionList" /> <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:String" Name="LastResult" /> <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:Boolean" Name="HasError" /> <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:String" Name="ExplicitDataList" /> <Variable x:TypeArguments="x:Boolean" Name="IsValid" /> <Variable x:TypeArguments="uf:UnlimitedObject" Name="d" /> <Variable x:TypeArguments="uaba:Util" Name="t" /> </Flowchart.Variables> <sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"> <x:Boolean x:Key="IsExpanded">False</x:Boolean> <av:Point x:Key="ShapeLocation">270,2.5</av:Point> <av:Size x:Key="ShapeSize">60,75</av:Size> <av:PointCollection x:Key="ConnectorLocation">300,77.5 300,107.5 190,107.5 190,206</av:PointCollection> <x:Double x:Key="Width">1040</x:Double> <x:Double x:Key="Height">1321.5</x:Double> </scg:Dictionary> </sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <Flowchart.StartNode> <FlowStep x:Name="__ReferenceID0"> <sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <scg:Dictionary x:TypeArguments="x:String, x:Object"> <av:Point x:Key="ShapeLocation">62,206</av:Point> <av:Size x:Key="ShapeSize">256,88</av:Size> </scg:Dictionary> </sap:WorkflowViewStateService.ViewState> <uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity ParentWorkflowInstanceId="{x:Null}" ResultTransformation="{x:Null}" ServiceHost="{x:Null}" SimulationOutput="{x:Null}" Add="False" AmbientDataList="[AmbientDataList]" CreateBookmark="False" DatabindRecursive="False" DisplayName="Assign(1)" HasError="[HasError]" sap:VirtualizedContainerService.HintSize="256,88" InstructionList="[InstructionList]" IsSimulationEnabled="False" IsUIStep="False" IsValid="[IsValid]" IsWorkflow="False" OnResumeClearAmbientDataList="False" OnResumeClearTags="FormView,InstanceId,Bookmark,ParentWorkflowInstanceId,ParentServiceName,WebPage" UpdateAllOccurrences="False"> <uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity.FieldsCollection> <uaba:ActivityDTO FieldName="[[Fragment]]" FieldValue="<script>
 $('#'+'[[Dev2helpPartName]]').mouseover(function(){
 var txt = '[[Dev2helpText]]';
 displayHelp("[[Dev2helpTitle]]",txt);
});
</script>" IndexNumber="1" /> <uaba:ActivityDTO FieldName="" FieldValue="" IndexNumber="2" /> </uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity.FieldsCollection> </uaba:DsfMultiAssignActivity> </FlowStep> </Flowchart.StartNode> <x:Reference>__ReferenceID0</x:Reference> </Flowchart> </Activity>
